<example>
<title>Iterating over attributes</title>
<programlisting>
void
print_attributes (GIBaseInfo *info)
{
  GIAttributeIter iter = { 0, };
  char *name;
  char *value;
 
  while (g_base_info_iterate_attributes (info, &iter, &name, &value))
    {
      g_print ("attribute name: %s value: %s", name, value);
    }
}
</programlisting>
</example>
